Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt">好多通信专业的毕业班童鞋，连自己要应聘的岗位是做什么事的都不知道。。。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;

Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt">这显然是不合适的。。。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt">什么是通信？</span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt">北邮版《通信原理》教材的第一句话是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt">——<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt">通信乃是互通信息。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt">其实，这句话就说出了通信的本质。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt">通信的目标就是如何让世界的任何人在任何时间、任何地点都进行信息的互通。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt">大到卫星，小到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt">SIM</span><span style="font-size:
14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:Helvetica;
mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt">卡，通信技术覆盖于我们生活的方方面面。移动通信、光纤通信、微波通信、卫星通信、计算机通信，全部都属于通信的一部分。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt">承载网工程师</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt">”</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:
Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，也经常叫做</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:Helvetica;mso-hansi-font-family:
Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt">传输工程师</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;

Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;

Helvetica;mso-bidi-font-family:Helvetica;color:#1A1A1A;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica",sans-serif;
